game.name: Trick Or Beat
game.shortDescription: Stack your trick pile or beat up your opponent! Trick or Beat is a fair 1v1 battlecards game with a shared draw pile. Can you discover the best strategies? Without any pay to win!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Stack your trick pile or beat up your opponent! Trick or Beat is a fair 1v1 battlecards game with a shared draw pile. Can you discover the best strategies? Without any pay to win!
